attributes.action: Full disclosure of truth by Government over Private Eye revelations that families of those killed at Hillsborough were spied on by the police
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for the Goverment to provide full disclosure of the facts relating to recent revelations exposed by Private Eye that the families and campaigners for justice for those that died at Hillsborough were put under surveillance by the police after the disaster, particularly given the apology from the prime minister over the attempted cover up by police pertaining to Hillsborough and a promise to leave no stone unturned in a full and public inquiry/investigation which is due to start in a matter of months, and hence to force the Met to reveal whether families/campaigners were put under surveillance.
